SALESFORCE HELP

VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Security: Restrict Access to CC Admin for Only Approved Users

Have extra confidence that your org and storefront data are secure against unwanted access. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now requires that users who access CC Admin have the Access B2B Commerce Admin Settings permission set assigned.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’18 (version 4.9) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: The permission set is available after your org is provisioned with the B2B Commerce permission set license. You can grant the Access B2B Commerce Admin Settings permission set to up to 50 users.

Assign both the B2B Commerce permission set and the Access B2B Commerce Admin Settings permission set to each user who needs access to CC Admin.

TIP You can propagate these permissions from a production environment to a sandbox and keep all of your orgs in sync. Either refresh your sandbox from production, or match licenses from production in a sandbox without a refresh.
SEE ALSO
Assign Permissions for Storefront Admins
Sandbox Setup Considerations
